description: After nearly six years since the concept first crossed our minds, TFCog (in association with animator Denis Pier) has finally released Scramble City 2! Scramble City 2 takes place where the original Scramble City leaves off, with Trypticon and Metroplex about to do battle. It bridges the gap between Scramble City and Transformers: The Movie just as Scramble City was meant to bridge Seasons 2 & 3.
